metadata.title: CVE-2018-20070 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Incorrect handling of confusable characters in URL Formatter in GoogleChrome prior to 71.0.3578.80 allowed a remote attacker to spoof thecontents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted domain name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20070` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '74.0.3729.169-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
